metadata.topic_title: Dual Employment Ethical Concerns in Same Industry

hierarchy.subdomain: Professional Ethics and Codes of Conduct

active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the ethical permissibility of dual employment for a cybersecurity consultant working part-time for two firms in the same industry (e.g., one specializing in endpoint security, the other in cloud security). Consider (ISC)² Code of Ethics Canon 1 (protect society) versus Canon 4 (advance the profession). What safeguards would make it ethical?
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
